title: [UWP] Layout cycle bug in slider
body: I just came across the following situation which caused a layout cycle error. Basically a Grid with columns Auto, *, Auto and a slider in the middle column. Dragging the slider thumb from side to side caused the layout cycle error. Setting a fixed width for the slider solved the problem. I'm using a UHD display with 150% scaling. The slider value ranged from 0 to 1 in 0.01 steps. It only occurred for one of several sliders like this that I had.

comments.body: We're tracking this on our GitHub: https://github.com/Microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml/issues/477
I can confirm we've encountered this as well.

Some more updates on this bug. It happens when I drag the thumb to the right-hand side of the slider. I think that because of the way the template is defined, this might result in the DesiredWidth of the slider control changing.
